p:
The oil samples radical scavenging activities were evaluated against the discoloration of DPPH free radicals purple solution. In order to achieve this goal, 2 ml of prepared methanolic solutions of DPPH (80 μg/ml) was mixed with the oils' methanolic dilutions equivalent volumes (final concentration: 0.01–1.28 mg/ml). The mixtures were incubated for 30 minutes in the darkness at ambient temperature. Absorbance values were recorded at 517 nm using a Tecan Infinite M200 spectrophotometer, and the oils free radical scavenging capacities (SC) were calculated according to the following equation:
(1)
